concept.title: Custom Link Measurement on Mobile Protocols

conbody.p: Many mobile device users download files to their devices such as podcasts, ring tones, and similar files. Because many mobile devices do not support JavaScript, link measurement must be implemented through redirects. To use redirects, you must modify the href links in the html to include the REDIR element. The general format for a custom link is as follows:
Keep in mind the following when creating link reference:

ul.li: The URL value must be URL encoded.
You should set a pageName or page URL (g) parameter.
Dynamic variables can read the URL parameter but not set it.
If no cookie is set, Adobe servers perform a normal cookie handshake.
To track links, you must include pe, pev1, and pev2 parameters.
